meanings.definition: In a way that is deserving of laughter or ridicule.
meanings.sent2: The clown's performance was laughably funny.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at singing was laughably off-key.
meanings.sent5: The movie's plot was laughably predictable.

meanings.definition: To an extreme or absurd degree.
meanings.sent3: Her speed in the race was laughably slow.
meanings.sent4: The size of the cake was laughably huge.
meanings.sent5: The team's victory was laughably easy.
